about.title: About
about.p1: Product Explorer is a simple React application built to demonstrate modern frontend concepts such as routing, data fetching, searching, and reusable UI components.
about.p2: You can browse products, view detailed information, and experiment with features powered by TanStack Query such as caching, refetching, and dynamic search.
about.more: Learn more on <1>our website</1> about how this app was built.
